DOC.detailed_description: This non-interventional , observational . This study look contemporary , real-world presentation , therapy , clinical outcome participant MM . Participants ask change routine clinical treatment . Participants complete patient self-reported outcome ( PROs ) survey home routine visit . The study enroll approximately 5000 participant . Participants assign one follow cohort base upon diagnosis MM : - ND MM - R/R MM This multi-center trial conduct worldwide . The overall time participate study 5 year . Participants evaluate followed-up period least 5 year , death , end study , whichever come first .
